mainText:
I just watched a clip of a speech Mr. Jobs gave at a graduation ceremony on Anderson Cooper where he talks about knowing that he will die, possibly soon, and it makes me want to live every day like him.  I have always thought that people with a definite end date are the luckiest in the world.  They don't have to worry about the unknown.  They know that the only thing that counts is what you do today, because you might not get tomorrow.  I only hope that yesterday, Steve was well enough to see the release of the iPhone 4s and that he was satisfied with the future of the company.  
Thank you Mr. Jobs for revolutionizing this world and making it a better place for all of us.
author: Zach
